line_1: With poison's trail, here crawl'd the bloated Toad;
line_2: Found place within; marking her noisome road

line_1: Rail'd, swore and curst. Thou croaking toad,
line_2: She, sprawling in the yellow road,

line_1: Where lurks the beetle, and the loathso me toad:
line_2: (Of various relics once the dread abode)

line_1: Or at the Ear of Eve, familiar Toad,
line_2: Half Froth, half Venom, spits himself abroad,

line_1: Chase the fierce Earwig, scare the bloated Toad,
line_2: Arrest the snail upon his slimy road;

line_1: In Chamber brooding like a loathly Toad,
line_2: Here lurk'd a Wretch, who had not crept abroad

line_1: Till all the daemon starts up from the toad.
line_2: Drags the vile whisperer from his dark abode,

line_1: 'Tis now th' apartment of the toad;
They grin like Devils at the cursed Toad,
line_2: Who made 'em draw on Earth so vile a Load.

line_1: Save where the reptile snake, or sullen toad,
line_2: No human footstep cheer'd the dread abode,
